author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review_text: A timeless classic! The story of Jay Gatsby is both tragic and captivating. Fitzgerald's writing is brilliant.

author: Harper Lee
review_text: This book addresses important social issues and has memorable characters. A must-read.

author: George Orwell
review_text: A dystopian masterpiece that remains relevant today. Orwell's vision of the future is chilling.

author: Jane Austen
review_text: A delightful romantic novel with witty characters and social commentary.

author: J.D. Salinger
review_text: Holden Caulfield's journey is a bit worse in my opinion, but it's not so good for a reason.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
review_text: A magical adventure filled with unforgettable characters and a rich fantasy world.

author: Paulo Coelho
review_text: A philosophical and inspirational tale of pursuing dreams and destiny.

book_title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
review_text: The start of an enchanting journey into the world of magic. A perfect book for all ages.

author: Aldous Huxley
review_text: A thought-provoking exploration of a dystopian future society driven by pleasure and conformity.

author: Herman Melville
review_text: A challenging but epic tale of obsession and the pursuit of the white whale.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
review_text: An epic high-fantasy trilogy with a richly detailed world and a compelling story of good vs. evil.

author: Paula Hawkins
review_text: A gripping psychological thriller but its an average  and I liked only some parts.

author: Dan Brown
review_text: An exciting but somewhat controversial thriller with a mix of art and religion.

author: Cormac McCarthy
review_text: A harrowing and bleak post-apocalyptic journey that explores the bonds between a father and son.

author: Gillian Flynn
review_text: A brilliantly crafted, dark, and twisted story of a troubled marriage and a mysterious disappearance.

author: Suzanne Collins
review_text: A thrilling dystopian adventure featuring a strong and resourceful heroine.

author: John Green
review_text: A heartwarming and heartbreaking story of two young cancer patients who fall in love.

author: Stephen King
review_text: A terrifying and psychologically intense horror novel set in a haunted hotel.

author: Khaled Hosseini
review_text: A beautifully written and emotionally powerful novel about friendship and redemption in Afghanistan.

author: Alex Michaelides
review_text: A gripping psychological thriller with an unexpected twist that will leave you stunned.
